findings.title: approve
findings.description: Potential reentrancy vulnerability in approve function.

findings.title: Insecure Transfer Function
findings.description: The _transfer function does not properly validate the input parameters, leading to potential security risks.

findings.title: transferFrom
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Unprotected Permit Function
findings.description: The permit function is marked as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized calls.

findings.title: Mint Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The 'mint' function has been marked as vulnerable.

findings.title: burnTokens
findings.description: Potential burn tokens vulnerability in the contract.

findings.title: Swap Function Vulnerability
findings.description: Potential vulnerability found in swap function.

findings.title: Skim
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in skim function

findings.title: Unprotected Synchronization
findings.description: The contracts do not properly handle synchronization when calling external functions, leading to potential reentrancy attacks.

findings.title: Unprotected Initialize Function
findings.description: The initialize function is declared as external and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unintended behavior or security risks.

findings.title: enableTrading
findings.description: The enableTrading function allows trading to be enabled or disabled.

findings.title: authorizeWallet
findings.description: The authorizeWallet function allows an owner to authorize a wallet address.

findings.title: increaseAllowance
findings.description: Potential reentrancy vulnerability due to unchecked allowance increase.

findings.title: decreaseAllowance
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: deliver
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: excludeFromReward
findings.description: The excludeFromReward function allows an owner to exclude a specific address from receiving rewards.

findings.title: includeInReward
findings.description: The includeInReward function allows an address to be included in the reward mechanism.

findings.title: _burn
findings.description: Internal burn function

findings.title: excludeFromFee
findings.description: The excludeFromFee function allows an address to be excluded from fee calculation.

findings.title: includeInFee
findings.description: The includeInFee function allows an address to be included from fee, which may lead to unintended behavior or security risks if not properly validated.

findings.title: excludedFromMaxTxAmount
findings.description: The excludedFromMaxTxAmount function allows an owner to exclude a specific address from maximum transaction amount restrictions.

findings.title: includeInMaxTxAmount
findings.description: The includeInMaxTxAmount function allows an address to be included in the maximum transaction amount, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: excludedFromExternalTokenMinAmount
findings.description: The excludedFromExternalTokenMinAmount function may allow certain addresses to bypass external token minimum amount restrictions.

findings.title: includeInExternalTokenMinAmount
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in includeInExternalTokenMinAmount function.
